Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Documentary \Doc`u*men"ta*ry\, a. Pertaining to written evidence; contained or certified in writing. ``Documentary evidence.'' --Macaulay.

documentary adj : relating to or consisting of or derived from documents [syn: {documental}] n : a film or TV program presenting the facts about a person or event [syn: {docudrama}, {documentary film}, {infotainment}]
